subject: Horseshoe Throwing
lead_paragraph: Alan Francis won his 16th world championship in horseshoes, and his eighth in a row, by beating his main rival twice on Saturday at the National Horseshoe Pitchers Association world tournament.
snippet: Alan Francis won his 16th world championship in horseshoes, and his eighth in a row, by beating his main rival twice on Saturday at the National Horseshoe Pitchers Association world tournament.
